title: Switching between tabbed and fullscreen connections sends titlebar off the screen
author: jcefoli
body_snippet:
When two connections are active - one that is tabbed and windowed, and one that is full screen, switching between the two causes glitchy behavior and you end up losing the top titlebar off the screen, and creates scrollbars in the full screened RDP connection.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Open one connection (in a tab)
1. Open a second connection (with the options configured to open it in fullscreen)
1. Minimize the fullscreen RDP window using the native blue RDP control bar
1. Cli...
